# Links

```````````````````````````````` example
[**foo**]
.
<p>[<strong>foo</strong>]</p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
[link [foo [bar]]](/uri)
.
<p>[link [foo [bar]]](/uri)</p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
[link *foo **bar** `#`*](/uri)
.
<p><a href="/uri">link *foo <strong>bar</strong> <code>#</code>*</a></p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
[foo [bar](/uri)](/uri)
.
<p><a href="/uri">foo [bar](/uri)</a></p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
*[foo*](/uri)
.
<p><em>[foo</em>](/uri)</p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
[foo <bar attr="](baz)">
.
<p><a href="baz">foo &lt;bar attr=&quot;</a>&quot;&gt;</p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
[foo`](/uri)`
.
<p>[foo`](/uri)`</p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
[foo<http://example.com/?search=](uri)>
.
<p><a href="uri">foo&lt;http://example.com/?search=</a>&gt;</p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
[link *foo **bar** `#`*][ref]

[ref]: /uri
.
<p><a href="/uri">link *foo <strong>bar</strong> <code>#</code>*</a></p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
[foo [bar](/uri)][ref]

[ref]: /uri
.
<p><a href="/uri">foo [bar](/uri)</a></p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
*[foo*][ref]

[ref]: /uri
.
<p><em>[foo</em>]<a href="/uri">ref</a></p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
[foo *bar][ref]

[ref]: /uri
.
<p><a href="/uri">foo *bar</a></p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
[foo <bar attr="][ref]">

[ref]: /uri
.
<p><a href="/uri">foo &lt;bar attr=&quot;</a>&quot;&gt;</p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
[foo<http://example.com/?search=][ref]>

[ref]: /uri
.
<p><a href="/uri">foo&lt;http://example.com/?search=</a>&gt;</p>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
**[hello](/)**
.
<p><strong><a href="/">hello</a></strong></p>
````````````````````````````````

Links can't contain links.

```````````````````````````````` example
[<https://example.com>](/foo)
.
<p><a href="/foo">&lt;https://example.com&gt;</a></p>
````````````````````````````````

Harmful link protection:

```````````````````````````````` example
<javascript:alert(0)>
.
<p><a href="#harmful-link">javascript:alert(0)</a></p>
````````````````````````````````

## Lists

```````````````````````````````` example
- foo
  - baz
- baz
.
<ul>
<li>foo<ul>
<li>baz</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>baz</li>
</ul>
````````````````````````````````

```````````````````````````````` example
- a
  - b
    - c
      - d
        - e
          - f
            - g
.
<ul>
<li>a<ul>
<li>b<ul>
<li>c<ul>
<li>d<ul>
<li>e<ul>
<li>f
- g</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
````````````````````````````````


```````````````````````````````` example
* test
    ```
    print()
    ```
.
<ul>
<li>test<pre><code>print()
</code></pre>
</li>
</ul>
````````````````````````````````
